Title: Patriots Day
Writer: Peter Berg (screenplay), Matt Cook (screenplay by), Joshua Zetumer (screenplay), Peter Berg (story), Matt Cook (story by), Paul Tamasy (story), Eric Johnson (story by)
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Dicky Eklund Jr., Michael Marchand, Rhet Kidd
Plot: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.
Production: Hutch Parker Entertainment, Closest to the Hole, Bluegrass Films, Leverage Entertainment
